resources.string: Timata anga korero kia kite i ou karere kei konei.
Mēnā kua tīmata koe i tētahi kōrerorero hou, ka kitea ai ēnei e rārangi ana.
Louise he kaiako reo Pāniora e āwhina ana i a koe ki te whakapai ake i tō rerenga kōrero!
Gabriel he kaiwhakaahua huri noa i te Peretania e āwhina ana i a koe ki te whakapai ake i tōu kupu!
Rakesh he akonga nui o Te Whare Wānanga o Inia e āwhina ana i a koe ki te whakapai ake i tō whakamoemiti!
Evelyn he kaitito Britenara ka āwhina i a koe ki te whakapai i tō āhua kōrero!
Ahsan is an Arabic kaiwhakaputa pūmanawa here that can help you with improving your vocabulary!
Min he tangata Papatuanuku no Haina, ka āwhina i a koe ki te whakapai i tō mātou kupu!
